article.title: Rockwell to Provide Radio and Data Link Systems for P-3C/EP-3 Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $29 million contract for the procurement of 55 AN/ARC-243 high frequency radio/ACQ-8 data link systems for the P-3C/EP-3 aircraft for the U.S. Navy, the Government of Norway, and various foreign military sales customers.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
